mapper.select: SELECT re_no, re_category, re_parent_no, re_mem_id, b.mem_name as re_mem_name re_content, re_ip, re_reg_date, to_char(a.re_reg_date,'MM-DD HH24:MM') as re_reg_date re_mod_date FROM reply a, member b where a.re_mam_id = b.memId and re_parent_no = #{reParentNo} and re_category = #{reCategory} order by re_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( re_no, re_category, re_parent_no, re_mem_id, re_content, re_ip, re_reg_date ) VALUES ( seq_reply.nextval , #{reCategory}, #{reParentNo}, #{reMemId}, #{reContent}, #{reIp}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET re_content = #{reContent} , re_mod_date = sysdate WHERE re_no = #{reNo}
